entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Snow mixed with rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h this morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
